journeys.title: Choosing the Right Spouse
journeys.summary: Activities to help you slow down, spot patterns, and choose wisely before emotional attachment forms.

milestones.title: You see more clearly
milestones.message: You are learning to notice patterns early.

milestones.title: You choose wisely
milestones.message: You finished strong. Keep choosing with clarity.

missions.title: Pause Before You Get Attached
missions.subtitle: Slow your pace when interest starts.
missions.whyThisMatters: Rushing creates blind spots. Pausing protects your heart.

cards.title: Your activity
cards.text: Today, pause before responding to someone you are interested in.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: If someone texts or calls, wait 10 minutes before replying.
Use the pause to ask: “Am I calm or excited right now?”

cards.title: Tip
cards.text: Interest does not require urgency.

missions.title: Notice Your Dating Pattern
missions.subtitle: Spot what you repeat without thinking.
missions.whyThisMatters: Unnoticed patterns repeat. Noticed patterns can change.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: Name one thing they had in common.
Say it out loud or write it down.

cards.title: Tip
cards.text: This is awareness, not self-judgment.

completionCard.title: You saw a pattern
completionCard.message: Seeing clearly is the first step to choosing well.

missions.title: Check Your Emotions
missions.subtitle: Separate attraction from readiness.
missions.whyThisMatters: Strong feelings do not always mean strong alignment.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: Ask yourself: “What am I feeling right now?”
Name it: excitement, loneliness, curiosity, attraction.
Then ask: “Is this feeling leading me wisely?”

completionCard.title: You checked yourself
completionCard.message: You didn’t let feelings drive alone.

missions.title: Watch Actions, Not Words
missions.subtitle: Pay attention to what is done, not promised.
missions.whyThisMatters: Consistency reveals character more than charm.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: Notice one action from someone you like today.

missions.title: Check Your Values
missions.subtitle: See if your values actually match.
missions.whyThisMatters: Shared values reduce future conflict.

cards.title: Choose your top values
cards.prompt: Pick your top 3 values right now:

cards.title: Steps
bullets: Ask yourself: “Does this person live these values?”

missions.title: Notice One Red Flag
missions.subtitle: Do not ignore what bothers you.
missions.whyThisMatters: Ignored red flags become future pain.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: Notice one thing that made you uncomfortable.
Ask: “Can I live with this long-term?”

missions.title: Set One Small Boundary
missions.subtitle: Protect your time and emotions.
missions.whyThisMatters: Boundaries keep attraction from becoming pressure.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: Say no to one thing you normally say yes to.
Keep your tone calm and respectful.

missions.title: Slow the Physical Pace
missions.subtitle: Let emotional safety lead.
missions.whyThisMatters: Physical speed can cloud judgment.

completionCard.title: You chose clarity
completionCard.message: Slowing down helps you see better.

missions.title: Pray for Discernment
missions.subtitle: Invite God into your decisions.
missions.whyThisMatters: Wisdom grows when you ask for it.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: Pray one sentence: “God, help me see clearly.”
Pay attention to peace or unease.

missions.title: Choose Your 7-Day Wisdom Habit
missions.subtitle: Practice choosing well daily.
missions.whyThisMatters: Small habits protect your future.

cards.title: Choose your habit
cards.prompt: Pick one habit for the next 7 days:
options: I pause before replying when interested.
I watch actions more than words.
I pray for clarity before emotional decisions.

journeys.title: Building Emotional Readiness for Love
journeys.summary: Activities to heal emotional gaps, stop rushing for validation, and become ready for healthy love.

milestones.title: You started healing
milestones.message: Readiness grows with small honest steps.

milestones.title: You are becoming steady
milestones.message: You are learning to choose love from peace, not pressure.

milestones.title: You are ready on purpose
milestones.message: You finished strong. Keep building healthy readiness.

missions.title: Stop Chasing Validation Today
missions.subtitle: Choose peace over attention for one day.
missions.whyThisMatters: If you chase validation, you will accept the wrong love. This activity breaks the habit.

cards.title: Your activity
cards.text: Today, do not post, text, or flirt to get attention. Choose peace instead.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: Notice the urge to seek attention.
Say: “I am okay even without this.”
Do one healthy action instead (walk, prayer, work, rest).

cards.title: Tip
cards.text: Readiness means you don’t need attention to feel worthy.

completionCard.title: You chose peace
completionCard.message: You didn’t chase validation today. That is strength.

missions.title: Name Your Emotion
missions.subtitle: Stop acting before you understand what you feel.
missions.whyThisMatters: Unnamed emotions control you. Named emotions guide you.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: Pause once today and ask: “What am I feeling?”
Name it: lonely, anxious, excited, rejected, calm.
Ask: “What is this feeling asking for?”

cards.title: Tip
cards.text: Your emotion is a signal, not a command.

completionCard.title: You gained clarity
completionCard.message: You understood your feeling before reacting.

missions.title: Close One Open Loop
missions.subtitle: Finish one small thing you keep avoiding.
missions.whyThisMatters: Emotional readiness grows when you keep your word to yourself.

cards.title: Pick one thing
cards.prompt: Choose one small task to complete today:
options: Reply a message you have been avoiding

completionCard.title: You followed through
completionCard.message: Keeping your word to yourself builds confidence.

missions.title: Protect Your Self-Respect
missions.subtitle: Say no to what drains you.
missions.whyThisMatters: If you can’t protect your self-respect, you will struggle to protect your future relationship.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: Say no to one request you don’t want.

cards.title: Tip
cards.text: Simple boundaries build maturity.

missions.title: Talk to One Safe Person
missions.subtitle: Choose wisdom over secrecy.
missions.whyThisMatters: Readiness grows faster when you have safe people who tell you the truth.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: Message or call one trusted person (mentor, pastor, close friend).
Tell them one area you want to grow in before marriage.

cards.title: Tip
cards.text: Safe counsel helps you avoid repeated mistakes.

completionCard.title: You chose wisdom
completionCard.message: You invited truth into your growth.

missions.title: Handle One Lonely Moment Well
missions.subtitle: Do not run to unhealthy comfort.
missions.whyThisMatters: Loneliness can push you into the wrong relationship. This activity trains steadiness.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: When loneliness hits, do not text someone just for comfort.
Do one healthy comfort instead: take a shower, pray, take a walk, call a friend.
Say: “I can soothe myself in a healthy way.”

completionCard.title: You stayed steady
completionCard.message: You did not use people to fill pain.

missions.title: Stop Rushing Love
missions.subtitle: Slow your pace for one day.
missions.whyThisMatters: Rushing is usually fear. Slowing down is maturity.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: Focus on your work, health, and growth.
If you feel urgency, breathe and slow down.

cards.title: Tip
cards.text: Love that is healthy can wait.

missions.title: Say Your Identity Statement
missions.subtitle: Build your worth from truth, not attention.
missions.whyThisMatters: If you don’t know who you are, you will accept less than you deserve.

cards.title: Say this out loud
bullets: “I choose what is good for me.”

cards.title: Tip
cards.text: Say it once today, then live it with your actions.

completionCard.title: You strengthened your identity
completionCard.message: Your words built your mindset today.

missions.title: Pray for Healing
missions.subtitle: Invite God into your heart work.
missions.whyThisMatters: Prayer calms your heart and brings wisdom for love.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: Pray one sentence: “God, heal my heart and guide my love.”

completionCard.title: You invited healing
completionCard.message: Peace grows when you pray and act wisely.

missions.title: Choose Your 7-Day Readiness Habit
missions.subtitle: Build steadiness daily.
missions.whyThisMatters: Small habits prepare you for healthy love.

cards.title: Choose your habit
cards.prompt: Pick one habit for the next 7 days:
options: I set one small boundary each day.
I handle loneliness without running to people.

completionCard.title: Journey complete
completionCard.message: You practiced readiness with peace and maturity.

journeys.title: How to Create Healthy Boundaries
journeys.summary: Activities to protect your time, body, emotions, and faith without guilt or harshness.

milestones.title: Halfway through
milestones.message: You are learning to protect your peace with clear boundaries.

missions.title: Say One Simple No
missions.subtitle: Say no once today without long explanations.
missions.whyThisMatters: Boundaries feel hard at first. This activity makes it simple and doable.

cards.title: Your activity
cards.text: Today, say no to one thing you don’t want to do.

cards.title: Pick your no
options: A call you don’t want to take

cards.title: Tip
cards.text: A boundary is not an insult. It is protection.

completionCard.title: You protected your peace
completionCard.message: That simple no built your self-respect.

missions.title: Stop Over-Explaining
missions.subtitle: Give a short answer once today.
missions.whyThisMatters: Over-explaining is often fear. Simple answers build confidence.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: When you say no today, stop after one sentence.
If they push, repeat your sentence calmly.

cards.title: Tip
cards.text: Repeat, don’t debate.

completionCard.title: You stayed firm
completionCard.message: Short answers keep your boundary strong.

missions.title: Protect Your Time
missions.subtitle: Block 30 minutes for yourself today.
missions.whyThisMatters: If you can’t protect your time, you will struggle to protect your future.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: Choose 30 minutes today that is yours.
Use it for rest, prayer, reading, or a walk.

cards.title: Tip
cards.text: Your time is valuable. Treat it like it matters.

completionCard.title: You protected your time
completionCard.message: That small block of time built discipline.

missions.title: Protect Your Body Boundary
missions.subtitle: Say what physical behavior is okay and not okay.
missions.whyThisMatters: Healthy love respects your body and your faith.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: Choose one physical boundary you will keep.
Say it out loud to yourself.
If someone pushes it, step back.

cards.title: Examples
bullets: “I don’t want to be touched like that.”

missions.title: Protect Your Emotional Boundary
missions.subtitle: Stop explaining your life to someone unsafe.
missions.whyThisMatters: Oversharing with unsafe people creates regret and emotional bondage.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: Notice one person who drains you emotionally.
Today, do not tell them your private business.

cards.title: Tip
cards.text: Privacy is a boundary too.

missions.title: Use a Clear Boundary Sentence
missions.subtitle: Say what you can’t do and what you can do.
missions.whyThisMatters: Clear sentences reduce guilt and confusion.

cards.title: Say this
bullets: “I can’t do ______, but I can do ______.”
Example: “I can’t talk now, but I can talk tomorrow.”

cards.title: Tip
cards.text: Your boundary can be kind and still firm.

missions.title: Set a Boundary With a Friend
missions.subtitle: Keep your friendships healthy.
missions.whyThisMatters: Some friendships become controlling. Boundaries keep them clean.

cards.title: Pick your boundary
options: I can’t stay out late today.
I can’t lend money right now.

missions.title: Set a Boundary With Family
missions.subtitle: Protect your peace at home.
missions.whyThisMatters: Family pressure can shape your choices. This activity helps you stay steady.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: Choose one boundary you need with family.
Say it calmly: “I won’t do that.”
Exit the conversation if they push.

cards.title: Tip
cards.text: Respect does not mean control.

missions.title: Handle Your Guilt
missions.subtitle: Do not break your boundary because you feel bad.
missions.whyThisMatters: Guilt can trick you into people-pleasing. This activity trains courage.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: When guilt rises, pause and breathe.

missions.title: Choose Your 7-Day Boundary Habit
missions.subtitle: Protect your peace daily.
missions.whyThisMatters: A simple habit makes boundaries easier over time.

cards.title: Choose your habit
cards.prompt: Pick one habit for the next 7 days:
options: I stop oversharing with unsafe people.

completionCard.title: Journey complete
completionCard.message: You protected your peace with clear boundaries.

journeys.title: Spotting Red Flags and Toxic Behaviors
journeys.summary: Activities to notice manipulation early, protect your heart, and avoid dangerous patterns.

milestones.title: Halfway through
milestones.message: You are learning to notice warning signs early.

missions.title: List Your Non‑Negotiables
missions.subtitle: Know what you will not accept.
missions.whyThisMatters: If you don’t know your lines, you will cross them under pressure.

cards.title: Your activity
cards.text: Write your top 5 non‑negotiables for a relationship.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: Save your list somewhere you can see it.
Do not break these under excitement.

missions.title: Notice Disrespect
missions.subtitle: Do not laugh off rude behavior.
missions.whyThisMatters: Disrespect grows when you excuse it early.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: Notice one disrespectful behavior today (tone, insult, mocking, pressure).
Ask: “Do I want a marriage like this?”

missions.title: Watch Consistency
missions.subtitle: Check if words match actions.
missions.whyThisMatters: Love is not only sweet talk. It is steady actions.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: Think about the last 2 weeks of this person’s actions.

cards.title: Tip
cards.text: Confusion is a red flag.

completionCard.title: You checked consistency
completionCard.message: Consistency is a sign of maturity.

missions.title: Notice Control
missions.subtitle: Spot controlling behaviors early.
missions.whyThisMatters: Control grows when it is tolerated. Early resistance protects you.

cards.title: Look for control
cards.prompt: Have you seen any of these?
options: They get angry when you are with friends

cards.title: Steps
bullets: If you notice control, do not ignore it.

missions.title: Notice Guilt Trips
missions.subtitle: Spot manipulation with guilt.
missions.whyThisMatters: Guilt is often used to force you to comply.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: Notice one time someone made you feel guilty to get their way.
Practice one response: “I hear you, but my answer is still no.”

completionCard.title: You resisted pressure
completionCard.message: You kept your boundary under guilt.

missions.title: Notice Lies
missions.subtitle: Pay attention to dishonesty.
missions.whyThisMatters: Small lies become big betrayals later.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: Notice one lie or inconsistency you’ve seen.

completionCard.title: You faced reality
completionCard.message: Honesty is a foundation, not a bonus.

missions.title: Trust Your Discomfort
missions.subtitle: Stop ignoring your gut.
missions.whyThisMatters: Your body notices danger before your mouth admits it.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: Think of one moment you felt uneasy.

missions.title: Tell a Safe Person
missions.subtitle: Bring light to what you see.
missions.whyThisMatters: Toxic patterns grow in secrecy. Wisdom grows in accountability.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: Share one concern with a trusted mentor/friend.
Ask: “Do you see this as a red flag?”

missions.title: Create Distance If Needed
missions.subtitle: Protect yourself without drama.
missions.whyThisMatters: If someone is unsafe, distance is wisdom.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: Observe how they respond to your distance.

cards.title: Tip
cards.text: Healthy people respect space. Unsafe people punish it.

missions.title: Choose Your 7-Day Wisdom Habit
missions.subtitle: Practice noticing early signs.
missions.whyThisMatters: A simple habit keeps you alert without fear.

cards.title: Choose your habit
cards.prompt: Pick one habit for the next 7 days:
options: I watch actions more than words.
I tell a safe person when I feel uneasy.

journeys.title: Identifying Your Toxic Triggers Before Marriage
journeys.summary: Activities to spot what triggers you, stop self-sabotage, and respond with maturity instead of reactions.

milestones.title: Halfway through
milestones.message: You are learning to respond calmly instead of reacting.

missions.title: Notice Your Trigger Today
missions.subtitle: Catch one moment you feel triggered.
missions.whyThisMatters: Triggers control you when you don’t notice them. This activity makes you aware.

cards.title: Your activity
cards.text: Today, catch one moment you feel triggered and pause.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: When you feel hot inside, pause for 10 seconds.
Name the trigger: disrespect, rejection, silence, tone, delay.

cards.title: Tip
cards.text: You can be triggered and still choose wisdom.

completionCard.title: You caught it
completionCard.message: Awareness is the first step to change.

missions.title: Find the Story in Your Head
missions.subtitle: Catch what you assume when you are triggered.
missions.whyThisMatters: Your mind tells a story fast. This activity helps you slow it down.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: Ask: “What story did I tell myself?”
Example: “They don’t care,” “I’m not enough,” “They will leave.”

cards.title: Tip
cards.text: A story is not always a fact.

missions.title: Notice Your Body Signal
missions.subtitle: Learn how your body reacts before you react.
missions.whyThisMatters: Your body gives warning signs. This helps you catch reactions early.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: When triggered, notice your body: tight chest, fast heartbeat, hot face.

cards.title: Tip
cards.text: Calm body first. Calm words follow.

completionCard.title: You calmed yourself
completionCard.message: You led your body instead of your body leading you.

missions.title: Replace One Reaction
missions.subtitle: Choose a new response.
missions.whyThisMatters: Changing one reaction can change your future marriage.

cards.title: Tip
cards.text: A calm response is strength.

missions.title: Set a Trigger Boundary
missions.subtitle: Protect yourself from situations that set you off.
missions.whyThisMatters: Some triggers reduce when you change your environment and boundaries.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: Name one trigger you want to reduce.
Example: “If I feel overwhelmed, I pause before replying.”

missions.title: Find the Root
missions.subtitle: Notice where the trigger comes from.
missions.whyThisMatters: Many triggers come from past pain. Awareness helps you heal.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: Ask: “When have I felt this before?”
Tell yourself: “I’m not in that place anymore.”

cards.title: Tip
cards.text: This is understanding, not blaming.

missions.title: Practice Soft Words
missions.subtitle: Use a calm sentence instead of harsh words.
missions.whyThisMatters: Your words can damage trust quickly. Soft words protect relationships.

cards.title: Choose your sentence
options: “I need a minute to calm down.”
“I want to respond well. Give me time.”

cards.title: Tip
cards.text: Soft words are not weakness.

missions.title: Tell Your Accountability Person
missions.subtitle: Let a safe person help you grow.
missions.whyThisMatters: Triggers reduce faster when you are accountable and supported.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: Tell a trusted person one trigger you want to change.
Ask: “Can you check on me this week?”

missions.title: Pray for Self‑Control
missions.subtitle: Ask God for strength in your reactions.
missions.whyThisMatters: Self-control is spiritual and practical. Prayer helps you stay steady.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: Pray: “God, help me control my words and reactions.”

missions.title: Choose Your 7-Day Self‑Control Habit
missions.subtitle: Practice calm responses daily.
missions.whyThisMatters: A simple habit reduces triggers over time.

cards.title: Choose your habit
cards.prompt: Pick one habit for the next 7 days:
options: I pause before I reply when triggered.
I use soft words instead of harsh words.
I breathe before I speak when tense.

journeys.title: Developing Emotional Maturity
journeys.summary: Activities to stop emotional reactions, take responsibility, and respond with calm and wisdom.

milestones.title: Halfway through
milestones.message: You are becoming calmer and wiser.

missions.title: Own One Mistake
missions.subtitle: Say “I was wrong” without excuses.
missions.whyThisMatters: Emotional maturity starts when you take responsibility without blaming others.

cards.title: Your activity
cards.text: Today, own one mistake without excuses.

cards.title: Rule
cards.text: No “but”. No defending.

missions.title: Lower Your Voice Once
missions.subtitle: Choose calm tone in one tense moment.
missions.whyThisMatters: A calm voice reduces fights and protects relationships.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: When you feel tense today, lower your voice.

cards.title: Tip
cards.text: Lower voice = lower fight.

completionCard.title: You stayed calm
completionCard.message: That calm tone protected the moment.

missions.title: Pause Before You Reply
missions.subtitle: Pause 10 seconds before you respond.
missions.whyThisMatters: Pausing breaks impulsive reactions.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: When you feel triggered today, pause for 10 seconds.

cards.title: Tip
cards.text: Your pause is your power.

missions.title: Replace Blame With a Need
missions.subtitle: Say what you need without attacking.
missions.whyThisMatters: Blame creates defense. Needs create clarity.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: Catch one blame sentence you usually say.

cards.title: Tip
cards.text: Clear needs build healthier love.

missions.title: Keep Your Word
missions.subtitle: Follow through on one promise you made.
missions.whyThisMatters: Reliability is emotional maturity in action.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: Pick one promise you made recently.

missions.title: Handle Rejection Well
missions.subtitle: Don’t chase. Don’t insult. Stay calm.
missions.whyThisMatters: How you handle rejection reveals maturity.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: If someone disappoints you today, don’t lash out.

cards.title: Tip
cards.text: Peace is power.

completionCard.title: You kept your dignity
completionCard.message: You didn’t beg or fight for attention.

missions.title: Take Feedback Calmly
missions.subtitle: Ask for one feedback and stay calm.
missions.whyThisMatters: Mature people can hear truth without exploding.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: Ask a safe person: “What should I improve?”

cards.title: Rule
cards.text: No arguing. Just listening.

missions.title: Choose Patience Once
missions.subtitle: Be patient in one moment you usually rush.
missions.whyThisMatters: Patience protects your future relationship.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: In one frustrating moment today, choose patience.

missions.title: Pray for Self-Control
missions.subtitle: Ask God for strength over your reactions.
missions.whyThisMatters: Self-control is spiritual and practical.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: Pray: “God, help me control my words and reactions.”

missions.title: Choose Your 7-Day Maturity Habit
missions.subtitle: Practice emotional maturity daily.
missions.whyThisMatters: Small habits build strong character.

cards.title: Choose your habit
cards.prompt: Pick one habit for the next 7 days:
options: I pause before I reply when tense.
I replace blame with clear needs.
I keep my word and follow through.

journeys.title: Discerning Compatibility and Values
journeys.summary: Activities to check alignment on faith, character, lifestyle, and future goals before commitment.

milestones.title: Halfway through
milestones.message: You are learning to choose alignment over feelings.

missions.title: Ask 3 Value Questions
missions.subtitle: Have a short values chat with someone you’re interested in.
missions.whyThisMatters: Compatibility becomes clear when you ask real questions early.

cards.title: Your activity
cards.text: Ask 3 value questions today (in person or chat).

cards.title: Ask these
bullets: “What does your faith look like daily?”
“What kind of home do you want to build?”
“What do you value most in a partner?”

cards.title: Tip
cards.text: Ask calmly. Don’t try to impress—listen.

missions.title: Compare Faith Practice
missions.subtitle: Check if faith is lived, not only spoken.
missions.whyThisMatters: Words are easy. Patterns show truth.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: Ask: “Do they live their faith daily or only on Sundays?”
Notice their fruit: humility, kindness, honesty.

completionCard.title: You checked reality
completionCard.message: Faith alignment is more than church attendance.

missions.title: Check Lifestyle Fit
missions.subtitle: Notice daily habits that affect marriage.
missions.whyThisMatters: Lifestyle mismatches become marriage stress later.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: Ask: “Can I live with this lifestyle long-term?”

missions.title: Do a Character Check
missions.subtitle: Look for humility and respect.
missions.whyThisMatters: Character is what you live with, not chemistry.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: Notice how they treat waiters, friends, and family.
Notice how they speak when angry.

completionCard.title: You checked character
completionCard.message: Respect is a must, not a bonus.

missions.title: Check Future Direction
missions.subtitle: Talk about life direction early.
missions.whyThisMatters: Two people can be good but going different directions.

cards.title: Ask this
bullets: “Where do you see yourself in 5 years?”
“Where do you want to live long-term?”

cards.title: Tip
cards.text: Clarity now prevents pain later.

missions.title: Check Conflict Style
missions.subtitle: Notice how they handle disagreement.
missions.whyThisMatters: How someone fights is how you will suffer or thrive.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: Notice: do they insult, stonewall, or talk calmly?

missions.title: Check Family Influence
missions.subtitle: Notice how family affects their decisions.
missions.whyThisMatters: Unhealthy family control becomes a marriage problem later.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: Notice if parents control their money, movement, or choices.

missions.title: Match Your Non-Negotiables
missions.subtitle: Check if your non-negotiables are respected.
missions.whyThisMatters: Your standards only protect you if you keep them.

missions.title: Pray for Clarity
missions.subtitle: Ask God to guide your decisions.
missions.whyThisMatters: Prayer helps you see beyond attraction.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: Pray: “God, help me see clearly and choose wisely.”

missions.title: Choose Your 7-Day Discernment Habit
missions.subtitle: Practice clarity daily.
missions.whyThisMatters: A simple habit keeps you aligned.

cards.title: Choose your habit
cards.prompt: Pick one habit for the next 7 days:
options: I watch actions more than words.
I pray for clarity before decisions.

journeys.title: Communicate Better, Love Better
journeys.summary: Activities to speak clearly, avoid mixed signals, and communicate with respect while dating.

milestones.title: Halfway through
milestones.message: You are learning to speak clearly and protect your heart.

missions.title: Send One Clear Message
missions.subtitle: Say what you mean without games.
missions.whyThisMatters: Clear communication prevents confusion and emotional stress.

cards.title: Your activity
cards.text: Today, send one clear message instead of hinting.

cards.title: Pick your message
options: “I enjoyed talking with you. I’d like to see you again.”
“I’m not comfortable with that. Let’s slow down.”
“I’m busy today. I can talk tomorrow.”

cards.title: Tip
cards.text: Clarity is attractive.

missions.title: Stop Mixed Signals
missions.subtitle: Match your words and actions.
missions.whyThisMatters: Mixed signals create unnecessary attachment and confusion.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: Notice one mixed signal you give (late replies, flirting then disappearing).

missions.title: Set Your Reply Pace
missions.subtitle: Reply with calm, not pressure.
missions.whyThisMatters: A healthy pace reduces anxiety and attachment.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: Choose a calm reply pace today.

cards.title: Tip
cards.text: Calm replies keep you grounded.

missions.title: Ask One Clarifying Question
missions.subtitle: Don’t assume—ask.
missions.whyThisMatters: Assumptions create fights and confusion.

cards.title: Ask this
bullets: “What do you want from this connection?”

cards.title: Tip
cards.text: Questions protect you from guessing.

missions.title: Speak Your Need, Not an Attack
missions.subtitle: Say what you need without insult.
missions.whyThisMatters: Needs build connection. Attacks break it.

cards.title: Rule
cards.text: No sarcasm. No insults.

missions.title: End an Unhealthy Chat
missions.subtitle: Exit a conversation that becomes disrespectful.
missions.whyThisMatters: Leaving disrespect teaches people how to treat you.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: If the chat becomes disrespectful, say:
“I’m not continuing this conversation like this.”

cards.title: Tip
cards.text: Peace is not weakness.

missions.title: Apologize Quickly
missions.subtitle: If you offend, apologize fast.
missions.whyThisMatters: Quick apologies prevent pride from growing.

missions.title: State Your Boundary Calmly
missions.subtitle: Protect your body and emotions with words.
missions.whyThisMatters: Clear boundaries reduce pressure and confusion.

cards.title: Pick your boundary
options: “I need respect in how you speak to me.”

cards.title: Tip
cards.text: Repeat your boundary calmly if they push.

missions.title: Pray Before a Hard Talk
missions.subtitle: Invite God into your words.
missions.whyThisMatters: Prayer helps you speak with wisdom and calm.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: Pray: “God, help me speak with wisdom and respect.”
Then send your message or have the talk.

completionCard.title: You invited wisdom
completionCard.message: Prayer helped you lead your words.

missions.title: Choose Your 7-Day Clarity Habit
missions.subtitle: Practice clear communication daily.
missions.whyThisMatters: Small habits create healthy communication.

cards.title: Choose your habit
cards.prompt: Pick one habit for the next 7 days:
options: I communicate clearly, not with hints.

completionCard.title: Journey complete
completionCard.message: You practiced clear communication and respect.

journeys.title: Dating With Purpose and Covenant Mindset
journeys.summary: Activities to date intentionally, avoid confusion, and treat dating as preparation for covenant.

milestones.title: You stayed aligned
milestones.message: You are choosing values over pressure.

missions.title: Define Your Dating Intent
missions.subtitle: Be clear about why you are dating.
missions.whyThisMatters: Dating without intent creates confusion and wasted emotions.

cards.title: Your activity
cards.text: Today, clearly define why you are dating.

completionCard.title: You chose clarity
completionCard.message: Knowing your intent sets your direction.

missions.title: State Your Intent Clearly
missions.subtitle: Say what you are looking for.
missions.whyThisMatters: Clear intent prevents mixed signals.

cards.title: Say this
bullets: I’m dating with marriage in mind.
I want to take things slowly and intentionally.

missions.title: Keep Your Standard
missions.subtitle: Do not lower your values to keep someone.
missions.whyThisMatters: Lowered standards lead to long-term pain.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: Name one standard you will not compromise.

missions.title: Slow the Pace
missions.subtitle: Avoid rushing emotional intimacy.
missions.whyThisMatters: Speed hides incompatibility.

missions.title: Check Alignment Early
missions.subtitle: Confirm values and direction match.
missions.whyThisMatters: Alignment matters more than attraction.

cards.title: Ask this
bullets: What are you building your life around?
What role does faith play in your life?

missions.title: Set a Physical Boundary
missions.subtitle: Protect your body and emotions.
missions.whyThisMatters: Boundaries keep purpose intact.

completionCard.title: You protected yourself
completionCard.message: That boundary kept your intent clear.

missions.title: Avoid Hidden Dating
missions.subtitle: Do not hide who you are seeing.
missions.whyThisMatters: Hidden dating leads to confusion.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: Tell one trusted person who you are dating.

missions.title: Watch Consistency
missions.subtitle: Look for steady actions over time.
missions.whyThisMatters: Consistency shows seriousness.

missions.title: Pray for Direction
missions.subtitle: Invite God into your dating choices.
missions.whyThisMatters: Prayer keeps your heart aligned.

missions.title: Choose Your 7-Day Purpose Habit
missions.subtitle: Practice intentional dating daily.
missions.whyThisMatters: Small habits protect covenant mindset.

completionCard.title: Journey complete
completionCard.message: You dated with purpose and clarity.

journeys.title: Faith and Spiritual Alignment
journeys.summary: Activities to ensure faith, values, and daily walk align.

milestones.title: You stayed aligned
milestones.message: You are choosing values over pressure.

missions.title: Define Your Faith Practice
missions.subtitle: Know what your faith looks like daily.
missions.whyThisMatters: Faith clarity prevents mismatch later.

cards.title: Your activity
cards.text: Describe your daily faith practice honestly.

missions.title: Observe Their Faith in Action
missions.subtitle: Watch how faith shows up daily.
missions.whyThisMatters: Actions reveal alignment.

missions.title: Pray Together Once
missions.subtitle: Share a short prayer together.
missions.whyThisMatters: Shared prayer reveals comfort.

missions.title: Discuss Core Values
missions.subtitle: Talk about faith-shaped values.
missions.whyThisMatters: Faith affects decisions.

cards.title: Ask
bullets: How does faith guide your decisions?

missions.title: Check Church Direction
missions.subtitle: Notice involvement and commitment.
missions.whyThisMatters: Direction affects family life.

missions.title: Watch Spiritual Fruit
missions.subtitle: Look for character growth.
missions.whyThisMatters: Fruit matters more than words.

missions.title: Align Faith Practices
missions.subtitle: Discuss how you’ll practice faith.
missions.whyThisMatters: Shared practices prevent conflict.

missions.title: Set a Spiritual Boundary
missions.subtitle: Protect your faith practices.
missions.whyThisMatters: Boundaries protect growth.

missions.title: Pray for Wisdom Together
missions.subtitle: Ask God for guidance.
missions.whyThisMatters: Prayer centers your relationship.

missions.title: Choose Your 7-Day Faith Habit
missions.subtitle: Practice faith alignment daily.
missions.whyThisMatters: Small habits protect unity.

journeys.title: Managing Sexual Chemistry and Attachment
journeys.summary: Activities to manage attraction wisely and avoid unhealthy attachment.

milestones.title: You stayed aligned
milestones.message: You are choosing values over pressure.

missions.title: Notice Attraction Without Acting
missions.subtitle: Acknowledge attraction calmly.
missions.whyThisMatters: Attraction does not require action.

cards.title: Your activity
cards.text: Notice attraction without acting on it.

missions.title: Reduce Physical Closeness
missions.subtitle: Create space to think clearly.
missions.whyThisMatters: Distance brings clarity.

missions.title: Limit Private Time
missions.subtitle: Avoid situations that increase temptation.
missions.whyThisMatters: Environment shapes behavior.

missions.title: Set Clear Physical Boundaries
missions.subtitle: State what you are not comfortable with.
missions.whyThisMatters: Clear boundaries reduce pressure.

missions.title: Delay Emotional Merging
missions.subtitle: Avoid acting like a couple too fast.
missions.whyThisMatters: Early merging creates attachment.

missions.title: Handle Sexual Tension Wisely
missions.subtitle: Choose self-control in tension.
missions.whyThisMatters: Self-control protects your future.

missions.title: Check Attachment Signs
missions.subtitle: Notice unhealthy attachment.
missions.whyThisMatters: Attachment without clarity leads to pain.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: Notice anxiety or fear of loss.

missions.title: Strengthen Your Independence
missions.subtitle: Focus on your own life.
missions.whyThisMatters: Independence keeps attraction healthy.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: Work on a personal goal today.

missions.title: Pray for Self-Control
missions.subtitle: Ask God for strength.
missions.whyThisMatters: Prayer strengthens discipline.

missions.title: Choose Your 7-Day Self-Control Habit
missions.subtitle: Practice healthy restraint daily.
missions.whyThisMatters: Small habits protect your future.

journeys.title: Building Secure Confidence for Healthy Dating
journeys.summary: Activities to stop insecurity-driven choices, build self-respect, and date from confidence instead of fear.

milestones.title: You are becoming steady
milestones.message: You are choosing healthy love with confidence.

missions.title: No Begging Today
missions.subtitle: Stop chasing anyone’s attention for one day.
missions.whyThisMatters: Confidence grows when you stop begging for what should be freely given.

cards.title: Your activity
cards.text: Today, do not beg for attention, affection, or replies.

cards.title: Do this instead
bullets: Focus on your work, health, or goals.

cards.title: Tip
cards.text: Healthy love does not require chasing.

completionCard.title: You chose dignity
completionCard.message: You didn’t chase attention today. That is confidence.

missions.title: Use Confident Posture
missions.subtitle: Stand and walk with self-respect.
missions.whyThisMatters: Your body affects your mind. Confident posture reduces insecurity.

cards.title: Tip
cards.text: Posture can calm anxiety quickly.

missions.title: Stop Comparing
missions.subtitle: Quit checking others to measure your worth.
missions.whyThisMatters: Comparison feeds insecurity and poor choices.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: Avoid checking an ex or rival today.
Avoid stalking social media for comparison.

completionCard.title: You protected your mind
completionCard.message: You kept your peace from comparison.

missions.title: Keep Your Standard
missions.subtitle: Don’t accept less because you’re lonely.
missions.whyThisMatters: Loneliness can push you into low standards.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: Name one standard you will not lower.

missions.title: Do One Self-Care Action
missions.subtitle: Treat yourself like someone valuable.
missions.whyThisMatters: How you treat yourself teaches others how to treat you.

cards.title: Tip
cards.text: Self-care is self-respect.

completionCard.title: You honored yourself
completionCard.message: You treated yourself with value today.

missions.title: Speak Confidently
missions.subtitle: Use clear words, not nervous hints.
missions.whyThisMatters: Clear words reduce anxiety and confusion.

cards.title: Rule
cards.text: No begging. No over-explaining.

missions.title: Handle Silence Calmly
missions.subtitle: Don’t panic when someone is quiet.
missions.whyThisMatters: Insecurity makes silence feel like rejection. Maturity stays calm.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: If they don’t reply, don’t double-text today.
Do one task and move on.

completionCard.title: You stayed calm
completionCard.message: You didn’t let silence control you.

missions.title: Get One Honest Feedback
missions.subtitle: Ask a safe person how you show up in dating.
missions.whyThisMatters: Feedback helps you grow faster.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: Ask a trusted person: “What do you think I should improve in relationships?”

missions.title: Pray for Confidence
missions.subtitle: Ask God to strengthen your identity.
missions.whyThisMatters: Confidence grows when your identity is rooted in God.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: Pray: “God, help me see myself the way You see me.”

missions.title: Choose Your 7-Day Confidence Habit
missions.subtitle: Practice confidence daily.
missions.whyThisMatters: Small habits make confidence natural.

journeys.title: Addressing Family Patterns for a Stronger Marriage
journeys.summary: Activities to identify unhealthy family patterns and choose new healthy patterns before marriage.

milestones.title: You are becoming steady
milestones.message: You are breaking patterns and building a healthier future.

missions.title: Name One Family Pattern
missions.subtitle: Identify one pattern you don’t want to repeat.
missions.whyThisMatters: Unseen family patterns repeat in marriage. Seeing it early protects your future.

cards.title: Your activity
cards.text: Name one family pattern you don’t want to repeat.

cards.title: Tip
cards.text: Seeing it is the first step to changing it.

missions.title: Notice What Triggers You
missions.subtitle: Catch what makes you react like your parents did.
missions.whyThisMatters: Triggers connect you to old patterns.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: Think of a recent conflict or tension.
Name the trigger: disrespect, tone, silence, money talk.

missions.title: Choose Your New Pattern
missions.subtitle: Pick one healthy pattern you will practice.
missions.whyThisMatters: New patterns must be chosen, not wished.

cards.title: Pick your new pattern
options: I speak my feelings, not silent treatment.
I tell the truth, not secrecy.

cards.title: Tip
cards.text: One new pattern can change your whole future.

completionCard.title: You chose a new way
completionCard.message: That choice built a healthier future.

missions.title: Practice Soft Words
missions.subtitle: Use one gentle sentence in a tense moment.
missions.whyThisMatters: Soft words reduce conflict and break harsh family habits.

cards.title: Say this
bullets: “I’m upset, but I want to talk calmly.”

completionCard.title: You used a new pattern
completionCard.message: Gentle words broke an old habit.

missions.title: Practice Money Honesty
missions.subtitle: Choose transparency with money.
missions.whyThisMatters: Money secrecy destroys trust in marriage.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: Name one area you want to improve.
Commit to honesty in money conversations.

missions.title: Practice Healthy Affection
missions.subtitle: Learn healthy ways to show care.
missions.whyThisMatters: Some homes lacked affection. You can learn a new way.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: Show care today to someone safe (friend/family).

missions.title: Set a Family Boundary
missions.subtitle: Practice boundaries with family control.
missions.whyThisMatters: Marriage requires healthy separation from unhealthy control.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: Choose one boundary you need with family.
Say it calmly: “I won’t do that.”

missions.title: Talk to a Mentor
missions.subtitle: Share one family pattern you want to change.
missions.whyThisMatters: Wise counsel helps you break patterns faster.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: Tell a trusted person: “This is the pattern I want to change.”

missions.title: Pray for Your Future Home
missions.subtitle: Ask God to help you build a healthy home.
missions.whyThisMatters: God can help you build what you didn’t see.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: Pray: “God, help me build a peaceful, healthy home.”

missions.title: Choose Your 7-Day New Pattern Habit
missions.subtitle: Practice your new pattern daily.
missions.whyThisMatters: Habits build your new normal.

completionCard.title: Journey complete
completionCard.message: You practiced breaking old patterns and building new ones.

journeys.title: Purity and Sexual Discipline
journeys.summary: Activities to build self-control, avoid temptation setups, and live with sexual purity and discipline.

milestones.title: You are becoming steady
milestones.message: You are building discipline and protecting your future.

missions.title: Remove One Trigger
missions.subtitle: Remove one temptation trigger today.
missions.whyThisMatters: Purity becomes easier when you remove triggers, not when you depend on willpower alone.

cards.title: Your activity
cards.text: Today, remove one trigger that leads you into sexual sin.

cards.title: Pick one trigger to remove
options: Move your phone out of your bed
Avoid being alone late at night

cards.title: Tip
cards.text: Removing triggers is wisdom, not weakness.

missions.title: Set Your Night Boundary
missions.subtitle: Protect your late-night decisions.
missions.whyThisMatters: Many falls happen at night. A boundary protects you.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: Charge your phone away from your bed.

missions.title: Replace the Habit
missions.subtitle: Replace temptation with a clean routine.
missions.whyThisMatters: Replacement is stronger than resistance.

cards.title: Pick your replacement
options: Read a chapter of a book

cards.title: Tip
cards.text: Replace, don’t just resist.

missions.title: Text Your Accountability Person
missions.subtitle: Bring your struggle into the light.
missions.whyThisMatters: Secrecy feeds addiction. Light brings strength.

cards.title: Send this text
bullets: “Please check on my purity this week.”

missions.title: Set Your Dating Boundary
missions.subtitle: State your purity boundary clearly.
missions.whyThisMatters: If you don’t set boundaries, chemistry will set them for you.

cards.title: Say this
bullets: “I’m keeping purity. Let’s keep our boundaries.”

missions.title: Avoid One Temptation Setup
missions.subtitle: Change your environment.
missions.whyThisMatters: Temptation is stronger in certain settings. Wisdom avoids setups.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: Avoid being alone in a private place today if it triggers you.

missions.title: Pray When Tempted
missions.subtitle: Use prayer as your first response.
missions.whyThisMatters: Prayer interrupts temptation quickly.

missions.title: Move Your Body
missions.subtitle: Use movement to break urges.
missions.whyThisMatters: Urges reduce when your body changes state.

missions.title: Fast One Thing
missions.subtitle: Practice self-control in a small way.
missions.whyThisMatters: Small self-control builds bigger self-control.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: Fast one thing for today (sugar, social media, snacks).
Use the urge as a reminder to stay disciplined.

missions.title: Choose Your 7-Day Purity Habit
missions.subtitle: Practice purity daily.
missions.whyThisMatters: Small habits protect your future marriage.

iconSet.notes: Merged Singles catalog (complete). Strict icon allowlist included.
